description.raw:
Sometimes the nodes \(specially happen to ash\) did not play nicely with the apt proxy installed in the system host. I did not find time to investigate the issue so here I'm implementing the usual workaround that is to restart the service. The variable is defined in the node itself on the Jenkins configuration:

Ash failing: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-install-sdformat6\_pkg-xenial-amd64/28/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-install-sdformat6_pkg-xenial-amd64/28/console)

Ash working: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-install-sdformat6\_pkg-xenial-amd64/26/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-install-sdformat6_pkg-xenial-amd64/26/)
description.html:
Sometimes the nodes (specially happen to ash) did not play nicely with the apt proxy installed in the system host. I did not find time to investigate the issue so here I'm implementing the usual workaround that is to restart the service. The variable is defined in the node itself on the Jenkins configuration:

Ash failing: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-install-sdformat6_pkg-xenial-amd64/28/console

Ash working: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-install-sdformat6_pkg-xenial-amd64/26/
